name: Control
description: Controller mixins and helpers for form components.

use: you want a consistent controlled/uncontrolled pattern.
avoid: you only need local `setState` without controllers.

constructors: `ControlledComponentAdapter<T>` — binds a value to UI with controlled/uncontrolled modes.
`ControlledComponent<T>` — mixin for widgets with controller support.

accessibility: Ensure adapters forward `enabled` state to child controls.
dont: Mutate controller values without notifying listeners.
